## Einsatz von Holzkohle in der industriellen Landwirtschaft  

Nina V. Schaaf<sup>1</sup>, Thomas Haemmerle<sup>1</sup>, Thomas Klammsteiner<sup>2, 3</sup>, Felix Kurzemann<sup>2</sup>, Benjamin Hupfauf<sup>1</sup>

<sup>1</sup>MCI - The Entrepreneurial School, Innsbruck, Austria  
<sup>2</sup>Department of Microbiology, University of Innsbruck, Innsbruck, Austria  
<sup>3</sup>Department of Ecology, University of Innsbruck, Innsbruck, Austria  
  
<br/>

### Overview 
Illumina MiSeq amplicon sequencing was performed to investigate bacterial and fungal communities within the samples. The bacterial V3-4 region was targeted using the primer set **341F** (CCTACGGGNGGCWGCAG) and **805R** (GACTACHVGGGTATCTAATCC), while the primer set **ITS3** (GCATCGATGAAGAACGCAGC) and **ITS4** (TCCTCCGCTTATTGATATGC) was used to target the fungal ITS2 region.
